price: A ellos Dios los perdonará, porque Dios es Remisorio, Indulgente.
arabic: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ulāika ʿasā al-lahu an yaʿfuwa ʿanhum wakāna al-lahu ʿafuwwan ghafūran
